metadata.synopsis: Two mothers and a child discuss the incoming arrival of the Absolute armies, and their plans to save themselves if Rivington is abandonned. This is the first mother's one-liner.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - go to 5;46;-15- Talk to the human mother with a child close to the well.

0.speaker: Monifa Diallo
0.text: The cult could raze this place to the ground and those upper city folks wouldn't even blink.

1.speaker: Monifa Diallo
1.text: The Absolute's army is on our doorstep. You want to live? Get out of here - before it's too late.
